entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
